titles.title: A resolution to elect Ted Stevens, a Senator from the State of Alaska, to be President pro tempore of the Senate of the United States.
A resolution to elect Ted Stevens, a Senator from the State of Alaska, to be President pro tempore of the Senate of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on January 7, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Elects Ted Stevens of Alaska as president pro tempore of the Senate.
